title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements by collaborating with stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. The architecture should consider scalability, maintainability, modularity, and performance. It should also address data storage, processing, and analysis requirements, as well as integration with external data sources and systems like geographic information systems (GIS), urban planning databases, community feedback platforms, and other relevant data sources (e.g., census data, zoning regulations, environmental data). The architecture should also include provisions for data security, privacy, and access control mechanisms.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models to store and manage urban area data, renewal plans, historical data, community feedback, and related information. Consider scalability, performance, data integrity, and data privacy requirements. Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations and implement appropriate security measures. The database design should also accommodate spatial data and geospatial analysis capabilities to support urban planning and visualization.

title: Urban Data Acquisition and Processing
description: Develop components to acquire and process urban area data from various sources (e.g., satellite imagery, GIS data, public records).

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for urban area analysis, renewal plan generation, and decision-making.
